Title: Post-Secondary Education
Description: This section outlines the individual's formal education beyond high school, detailing the institutions attended, degrees earned, subject areas studied, and the dates of attendance. This highlights the foundational academic background and qualifications.

Title: Dissertations
Description: In this section, provide information about the individual's dissertation work, including the title and the supervisor's name. This showcases significant research contributions and areas of expertise.

Title: Continuing Education or Training
Description: This section lists any additional education or training undertaken post-degree, including the institution or organization, the rank or title achieved, and the dates of participation. This demonstrates ongoing professional development and commitment to staying current in the field.

Title: Continuing Medical Education
Description: This section covers ongoing medical education activities, specifying the institution, type of education, details of the program, and the dates. It highlights the individual's dedication to continuous learning and professional growth in medicine.

Title: Professional Qualifications, Certifications and Licenses
Description: Here, detail any professional qualifications, certifications, or licenses the individual has obtained. This section emphasizes specialized skills and formal recognition of expertise.

Title: Prior Employment
Description: This section lists previous employment positions, including the institution or organization, the rank or title held, and the dates of employment. It provides a history of the individual's career progression and experience.

Title: Present Employment
Description: Detail the current employment position, specifying the institution or organization, rank or title, and dates of employment. This section reflects the individual's current professional standing and responsibilities.

Title: Leaves of Absence
Description: This section records any leaves of absence, specifying the institution or organization, type of leave, and dates. It provides context for any gaps in employment or education.

Title: Teaching Interests
Description: Outline the individual's teaching interests, detailing specific areas or topics they are passionate about teaching. This section gives insight into their educational focus and preferred subjects.

Title: Courses Taught
Description: List all courses the individual has taught, including the year, session, course name, description, scheduled hours, class size, and details about lectures, tutorials, labs, and other teaching activities. These should all be listed as per year. This showcases their teaching experience and curriculum involvement.
